mapper.select: SELECT u_auth FROM authority WHERE 1=1 AND u_idx = #{u_id}

SELECT id as u_id, password as password, writer as u_name, isAccountNonExpired as isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked as isAccountNonLocked, isCredentialNonExpired as isCredentialsNonExpired, isEnabled as isEnabled FROM user WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{u_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, password, writer, isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked, isCredentialNonExpired, isEnabled ) VALUES ( #{u_id}, #{password}, #{u_name}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isCredentialsNonExpired}, #{isEnabled} )
